comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.This contract includes one or more amendments. A & E Consultant services for project scope and design development for the demolition of and removal of a resident triplex building at at 811-813 Frist Street East & 348 Prince Arthur Street, Cornwall, ON. Amended to proceed with stage 2 to include preparation of tender documents (Plans & Specs) and Resident Site Service and Construction Contract Admin.
